benchmark_details.name: Towards a Benchmark for Causal Business Process Reasoning with LLMs
benchmark_details.overview: This work develops a benchmark to assess the ability of LLMs to reason about causal and process perspectives of business operations, which are referred to as Causally-augmented Business Processes (BPC). It includes a set of situations, questions, and deductive rules for assessing LLMs' reasoning abilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To equip LLMs to measure and improve their capacity to reason about causal business processes.

data.source: A set of situations, questions, and deductive rules related to causal business processes.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy was measured by the proportion of correctly answered questions across different LLMs.
methodology.interpretation: An objective numeric scale is needed to compare and assess various LLM performances.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was evaluated using a small subset to assess its applicability and measure accuracy.
